local_intent: Translate the T-block forward (0°) by 0.1 using a push after re-aligning; brief settle wait.
assumptions: TCP yaw already set to 90° from earlier step
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase long push seen in the GLOBAL_BT (Push t_block, distance 0.1, direction 0) with alignment and retry semantics, followed by a short wait.
